segments.text: Good afternoon Miss.Are there plane tickets to San Francisco on the day after tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon Sir . I'll have a look at the time-table for you . I'm sorry but there aren't any direct flights available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there tickets for Saturday then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes there are.How do you want to go , First class or coach ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll need a coach open return . What's the fare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time will the flight put me there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The flight will get you there at six Sunday morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK I'll take three . What's the flight number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The flight number is 301 at Gate Two .
segments.speaker: S2
